data.eml:eml: A new section and species of AgaricussubgenusPseudochitonia from Thailand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article He, Mao-Qiang, Chuankid, Boontiya, Hyde, Kevin D., Ratchadawan Cheewangkoon,, Zhao, Rui-Lin (2018): A new section and species of AgaricussubgenusPseudochitonia from Thailand. MycoKeys 40: 53-67, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.40.26918, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.40.26918
